newsitem.title: SPAIN: Gran Canaria June cargo traffic up 4.4 percent.
newsitem.headline: Gran Canaria June cargo traffic up 4.4 percent.

text.p: Spain's Gran Canaria airport handled 4.4 percent more cargo in June compared with the same month last year, the island's airport authority said.
Volume rose to 2,451 tonnes compared with 2,348 tonnes, taking the accumulated total this year to 20,420 tonnes, 14.2 percent more than the same period in 1996.
The airport also handled 414 tonnes of mail in June, 15.3 percent less than in June 1996. The accumulated mail total was up 0.6 percent at 2,814 tonnes.

Passenger numbers were 5.8 percent higher in the month at 550,624 excluding transit passengers, taking the accumulated total to 3.88 million, 3.1 percent ahead of 1996. - Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+ 44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017 - www.racs.com
